Description: Focus Next Link or Input Field
Focus Previous Link or Input Field
Save Focused Link (requires non-default browser.altClickSave setting)
Go one Word to the Left
Go one Word to the Right
Close the Find or Quick Find bar
Focus Address bar for Web Search (writes "? " there)
Focus Search bar (if search bar is shown)
Change the Default Search Engine (in the Search bar or new tab page)
View search engine menu (when Search bar is focused)
Cycle through Tabs in Recently Used Order (if enabled in Preferences)
Go one Tab to the Left
Go one Tab to the Right
Move Tab to start (tab element must be focused)
Move Tab to end (tab element must be focused)
Open Address or Search in New Background Tab (from address bar)
Open Address or Search in New Foreground Tab (from address/search bar)
Open Address or Search in New Window (from address bar)
Open Search in New Background Tab (from new tab page search field)
Open Search in New Foreground Tab
Open Focused Bookmark or Link in Current Tab
Open Focused Bookmark in New Foreground Tab
Open Focused Bookmark in New Background Tab
Open Focused Link in New Background Tab
Open Focused Link in New Foreground Tab
Open Focused Bookmark or Link in New Window
Moves the URL left or right (if cursor is in the address bar)
Show List of All Bookmarks (in empty search field)
Focus the Page Number input box
Toggle Menu Bar activation (showing it temporarily when hidden)
Clear Search Field in Library or Sidebar
Move the dotted rectangle to left or right tab
Move the dotted rectangle to first tab
Move the dotted rectangle to last tab
Select or deselect the tab with the dotted rectangle.
